question: Which of the following policy was launched in 1992 just after the end of the cold war, following the collapse of the Soviet Union?
explanation: India’s Look East Policy was for the first time pursued by Narsimharao Government in 1992. Under this policy, India focused its attention toward South-East Asia, which was long neglected during the Cold war period. This policy was further cemented by successive prime ministers and now converted into “Act East Policy” by the current government.
